top10_tweets_like: People using R for crazy modelling techniques, stunning maps, building aps, making video games and probably bringing unicorns back from extinction!  Then there's me Googling "change axis labels in ggplot2" for the millionth time this year! #phdchat #phdlife #RStats

I am very happy to say that you can now create tables in PDF format (in addition to HTML, Word and PowerPoint) with the #rstats #flextable package. I am preparing a new version for CRAN, your feedbacks are welcome! https://t.co/zMJyRDNzM5 https://t.co/3ghE6gMPp9

Introducing a work-in-progress #rstats package called postcards: a small collection of R Markdown templates to help you quickly create a personal website or landing page. I would really appreciate your feedback before I send this to cran! https://t.co/iui0KJ6c3y https://t.co/80bHRS1d2R

Hi #TidyTuesday fam. My #DataVisualization on the #hiking dataset by @tidy_explained (Also submission for their amazing screencast!üòä). It shows a summary on the hiking locations (tracks, length, elevation).

Done in #Rstats #ggplot2 #tidyverse ofc.

#RStats world, save the date! useR! 2021 will take place virtually from July 5-9, 2021. Catch a first glimpse of the conference on our website, learn about a few key dates, check our blog or say 'hi' to our mascot. https://t.co/mVztj1OQZ5 #useR2021.

Had a great time yesterday with @RLadiesAlgiers talking about column-wise & row-wise operations with #dplyr for more efficient data wrangling, summarizing & modeling. Feel free to check out the slides for some tips on using R more "wisely" ü¶â #rstats

https://t.co/6ZUKDzM2ko

Lately, I've been analysing some LiDAR data using the lidR package in #rstats.
I am impressed by the quality of this package and its great documentation at https://t.co/NfqANXlIZs. 

Awesome work by Jean-Romain Roussel, @GoodbodyT, and @PiotrTompalski.

Thanks!

#rspatial #lidar https://t.co/ogK1Bz1Sn7
